FAQ

SELECT A CATEGORY

Q:How to create text styles?

  • First, select the heading you want to make as a text style. Next, click on the cube-like symbol next to the word "Text". Lastly, click add.
  • After clicking add, put the name for the style you want. Then create style.
  • After adding a text style, the name of the style should now be visible.

Q:How use text styles on actual project element?

  • Select an element, click the cube-like symbol next to Text, then choose the text style.
  • Final result.

Q:How to detach styles on an element?

  • Select the element you want to have its style detached. Then click the the detach button as the picture you see below.
  • Now, you can customize element properties freely again.

Q:How to create components?

  • Select the heading.

Q:How to add components?

  • Select the heading.

Q:How to add components?

  • Select the heading.
